EmailTemplate.name: Ignite - TBC 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite - The Black Country
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Ignite: Get Inspired, Reunite & Spark your Future!
An exclusive event for NCS Graduates from Walsall, Wolverhampton, Sandwell and Dudley.
Saturday 28th November 2.00 - 6.00pm
Newhampton Arts Centre, Dunkley Road, Wolverhampton, WV1 4AN
Say YES to IGNITE and click on this link to get your ticket:
www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ignite-the-black-country-tickets-19492850641
If you have questions about Ignite the Black Country, contact the team:
becky.hones@the-challenge.org
